parsed.internal_thinking: I have successfully placed my starting settlements to cover all five resources: Node 20 provides Wood (11), Brick (6), and Sheep (8), while Node 44 provides Ore (2) and Wheat (9, 6). My current resources are 1 Ore and 2 Wheat. My next immediate goal is to expand towards the 3:1 port at Node 51 or 53, having already built a road from Node 44 to Node 52. The robber is currently on the Desert (Hex 10), which is ideal as it's not blocking any production. Since it's the start of my turn and I have no development cards to play, I need to roll the dice to generate resources and advance my position. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Continue the path from Node 52 to Node 51 or 53 to secure the 3:1 port. Monitor AI_2's progress near Node 42, as they might compete for the southern ports. Priority for spending resources: Road to port, then upgrade Node 44 to a City to capitalize on the high-probability Wheat (6, 9).
parsed.say_outloud: Alright everyone, let's see what the dice have in store for us this turn! Good luck on the rolls.
